body:
http://dotwe.org/vue/cd8f56747963cee086f5e01d687db30d

Here is a demo. You can try it use the playground app.
The `getData` method contains an obvious err, when it's invoked from `@click` ,both `onJSException` method in JSExceptionAdapter or `onException` method in WXPageActivity can capture an exception. But it throw no err when invoked in `created()` or `mounted()`.

@YorkShen
Provide a demo, please

- Travis tests are failing
- Android only? iOS implementation planned or is there another alternative available there?
- Is this all original code you wrote or are there also other, third party files added via this PR?

> * Travis tests are failing
> * Android only? iOS implementation planned or is there another alternative available there?
> * Is this all original code you wrote or are there also other, third party files added via this PR?

- Travis tests error is not config NDK path,
```
* What went wrong:
A problem occurred configuring project ':commons'.
> Could not resolve all dependencies for configuration ':commons:_debugPublish'.
   > A problem occurred configuring project ':weex_sdk'.
      > NDK not configured. /usr/local/android-sdk/ndk-bundle
        Download it with SDK manager.
```
There are nothing changes in native code...so is this must be corrected？ 

- Currently , Android Only !! (I'm not good at IOS ) Hope there are someone to make  iOS implementation...
- Some code modify from open source community, like [HtmlCompat](!https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/329e269aedea0af6c71f2dc4f66b8528d426c222/android/sdk/src/main/java/com/taobao/weex/ui/component/html/htmlcompat/HtmlCompat.java) 
And there already contains License in file head.

> 
> 
> 看起来和Appium测试框架有关，我这里也无法推断具体原因。
> 
> 使用Appium，是想要做哪方面的测试呢

主要是做跨平台的UI自动化测试，在写测试脚本时发现，Android平台中涉及到上图类型的弹窗控件，一旦我点击了【确定】/【取消】以后，在接下来的界面就无法再定位到元素。只能使用press_keycode()返回首页。（也就是说点击控件中的【确定】/【取消】以后，虽然无法定位到当前页面的元素了，但driver驱动还是能用的）。我咨询过其他人，他们说没有这种情况，因为他们不是用的appium。

This is a problem I want to solve years ago.

But as there are many util class or base class under `com.taobao` and `com.alibaba` package, such as `com.taobao.weex.ui.component.WXComponent`, which is the base class for almost every UI component.

If we change the package name directly to `org.apache.*`, users with custom plugins that extends the base class like `com.taobao.weex.ui.component.WXComponent` or uses the util class will have many problems when updating to the latest version, as the package renaming will cause lots of compiling issue.

Any advice on reducing the cost of renaming for Weex users?
TravisCI is failed because of NDK environment on the TravisCI server, this can be ignored.

> It seems like a`1px`bug, I will look into it.

OK,I hope you to fix this,thanks.

1. Prodive a demo in [dot.we](http://dotwe.org/vue) as mentioned in the issue template
2. Update to the latest version and try again

http://dotwe.org/vue/9b990bf01a12497d0338ef0b997aff1d
在dot.we上是正常的，但是这个和移动端用的sdk不是一样的吧

官方文档：
该功能部分依赖于编译工具，请确保 weex-loader 的版本升级到最新（v0.7.2+）
使用最新版的 playground app（SDK 版本 0.18.0 及以上）才可以扫码查看原生效果，也可以直接使用dotwe查看Web预览效果

我的环境为：
"weex-loader": "^0.7.2",
weex sdk version = "0.18.0"
weex -v： v1.3.11
条件都是符合的啊

I will Google Translate your questions first

> I just started to make a demo in my project, it is ok under Android, but not under ios, my bindingx environment has been built, I have looked at the previous Issues, and then put the official demo in weex playround Running in, can't, also refer to [https://github.com/alibaba/weex-ui/blob/master/example/ep-slider/index.vue this way] (https://github.com /alibaba/weex-ui/blob/master/example/ep-slider/index.vue%E8%BF%99%E4%B8%AA%E7%9A%84%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F );
> [https://h5.m.taobao.com/trip/wx-detection-demo/ep-slider/index.weex.js This is the compiled address, I will generate the QR code in weex](https:/ /h5.m.tao.com/trip/wx-detection-demo/ep-slider/index.weex.js%E8%BF%99%E4%B8%AA%E6%98%AF%E7%BC%96 %E8%AF%91%E5%90%8E%E7%9A%84%E5%9C%B0%E5%9D%80,%E6%88%91%E6%8A%8A%E7%94%9F% E6%88%90%E4%BA%8C%E7%BB%B4%E7%A0%81%E5%9C%A8weex) playgound runs, I go to slide the element and always jump to the first element

I think the `wxc-ep-slider` component you mentioned is not under this repo, maybe you should ask this question in [weex-ui](https://github.com/alibaba/weex-ui/) repo, Thanks.

1. Please Use English to describe your question, I will use Google translate this time

> Hi, use the web component to load the webpage, which embeds a webpage with video, and the following phenomenon occurs.
> Embed the Tencent video webpage (the browser is normal, other clients are also normal):
> Https://v.qq.com/x/cover/f04er0aovj2et7b/c0831fn8ukt.html
> A situation that cannot be displayed appears.
> 
> Reproduce method:
> 1. Go to http://dotwe.org/vue/8bdac9c81fac5f4da2654d42bd5800d5
> 2. Change src to the above video address and use the playground to scan for access.
> 
> This problem has appeared on most Android machines tested, please fix it.

2. This is the default behavior of the system's webview, which is full of bug in Android.  You may replace the System's webview by UC/QQ if you need. 

3. A PR for QQ/UC webview is welcomed.
Have you tried the latest version of weex?

I honestly don't know much about Android development.

Is there a way to maybe rename the real classes but keep an "alias" with the old name around so plugin can keep working?
@metooweb 怎么加key 啊？在v-if的属性标签上加么？

sdk为0.19的时候可以正常运行  为0.20的时候 .we代码编译的js 报cant find variable __weex_define,  .vue代码正常运行
下面是我的  .we 代码 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14165811/53281784-3b730c00-3769-11e9-9488-ab3fc2d40f45.png)

> Have you tried the latest version of weex?

I downloaded the latest playground application from weex offical website.
* android weex playground with weex sdk version 0.20.0.1
* ios weex playgound with weex sdk version 0.20.0

I also used taobao mobile application (version 8.4.0) on iOS platfrom to run the demo and had the same issue.
@chenzefeng09 链接跪了，有新的地址吗

yes ,u are right,but[ weex-ui](https://github.com/alibaba/weex-ui/) not reply

> Is there a way to maybe rename the real classes but keep an "alias" with the old name around so plugin can keep working?

Sadly, no.

As there is no way to avoid the backwards compatibility issue now, I think maybe we should keep it untouched until have a better solution.

感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: The built-in modal module finds a bug, and the prompt() return value is the first input element of the page. If the page has multiple input elements, there will be problems. I changed it myself, but how to replace the built-in modal.

You have two options:
1. Fix the problem based on current `modal` code, and give us a Github PR, which is encouraged.
1. You can implement the modal by yourself, and register a `modal` with the same name using the below [approach](https://weex.apache.org/guide/extend/extend-android.html#module-extend)

The problem has been solved, thanks

@humbass @BengBu-YueZhang @HelloMrJay @Gitsifu 

Fixed https://github.com/weexteam/weex-toolkit/commit/2e0964b73c003aa1df0f84bc9bca1635a8882c17.

Try flowing command to fix this case:

```
$ weex repair @weex-cli/run@latest
```

Try use [weex-toolkit](https://github.com/weexteam/weex-toolkit), you will get all the Android/iOS log.

I have captured the Android log ,which is `java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Invalid input to toASCII: trade_api.qywgpo.com`, Google search it, you will find the [answer](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/51563859/javax-net-ssl-sslhandshakeexception-java-lang-illegalargumentexception-invalid).

`_` is illegal when using https in Android network library. Try the following approach:
* Use `http` instead of `https`.
* Avoid `_` if you assist on `https`.

> @humbass @BengBu-YueZhang @HelloMrJay @Gitsifu
> 
> Fixed [weexteam/weex-toolkit@2e0964b](https://github.com/weexteam/weex-toolkit/commit/2e0964b73c003aa1df0f84bc9bca1635a8882c17).
> 
> Try flowing command to fix this case:
> 
> ```
> $ weex repair @weex-cli/run@latest
> ```

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23445650/53414243-3cc26400-3a09-11e9-9309-8407025c387d.png)

我测试官方的demo发现没有问题，我再测试一下

Please check the document of Vue.js (https://vuejs.org/v2/guide/components-edge-cases.html#Accessing-Child-Component-Instances-amp-Child-Elements).

> When ref is used together with v-for, the ref you get will be an array containing the child components mirroring the data source.

Try `this.$refs.for[0].ref`

According to the [document](https://weex.apache.org/docs/modules/navigator.html), I don't think this feature is supported.

If you'd like to request a feature, send an email to the [mailing list](https://weex.apache.org/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#mailing-list)

Thanks for you feedback.

感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> We have a lot of previous jsbridge, but not for weex, but we must inherit WXModule for weex, so there is some work, so I would like to ask if weex has a way to directly inject a java object into js?

Short answer: **NO**

Long Answer: To achieve JS -> Java communication, you need a bridge, which can be `WXModule`, `WXComponent` or even raw JNI method.

Also, please follow the [issue template](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues/new) when you report a bug. The more information you give, the faster issue will be resolved.

Thanks

请问0.21.0版本大概什么时候出啊

我自己找到了解决办法，在sdk源码WXRecyclerComponent.mm中 
_collectionView.delegate = self;下方添加一句 _collectionView.alwaysBounceVertical = self;即可解决
不过不够严谨，如果waterfall横向就不能这么写了，希望官方能尽快修复。

`<richtext>` uses a hack way to implement inline feature on Android or iOS. I think this failure is due to the hack in JavaScript.

Currently,`<richtext>` is still alive but not maintained by current weex committers anymore.

I will change the document to make that clear, meanwhile, this bug will not be fixed.

Thanks.

`auto` is a reserved value and not open to the developers.

I will make the document clear, thanks.
Bug received, we will look into it, not sure when to resolve.

it's odd that this problem won't show in online editor.
maybe the version of 0.19 cause this problem.
i will try the newest version

WeexSDK does not contain image downloader. You should adapt WeexSDK to a picture library such as SDWebImage. If you want to support GIF, you should make sure that your picture library supports GIF by UIImage.
